Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 15
Powers:
Balm Of The Druids: (3 PP) RTouch Applied salve absorbed into injury restores 1 wound (Raise 2) suffered in the past hr (+10 PP Restores older Wound; +20 PP Heals crippling injury; +1 PP Neutralizes poison or disease) (see Healing)
Eclipse Moonshine: (2 PP) R12" Conceals target's magical aura (Detect neg) for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target; +1/+2 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Detect-2) (see Detect/Conceal Arcana)
Horn Of The Rhino: (2 PP) R12" Chitinous covering forms on target weapon, inflicting +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target) (see Smite)
Reveal Moonshine: (2 PP) R12" Target can detect the presence of magical auras for 5 rd (Raise visible to others) (+1 PP/additional target; +1/+2 PP 2"/3" radius; +1 PP Detect-2) (see Detect/Conceal Arcana)
Vine Squeeze: (2 PP) R12" Grasping vines restrain target (Raise binds) for 5 rd, inflicting d6/rd (Vigor neg) after 1st rd (Athletics or breaking Hardness 5 ends) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2 PP Athletics-2, Hardness 7) (see Entangle)
Volley Of Stinging Staves: (1 PP) R24" A shower of sharpened staves inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6)) (see Bolt)
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
